name: NSPersistentHistoryResultType
desc: The types of results from a persistent history change request.

items.name: case statusOnly
items.desc: The status of the persistent history change request.

items.name: case count
items.desc: The number of persistent history changes since the requested date, token, or transaction.

items.name: case objectIDs
items.desc: The identifiers of managed objects changed since the requested date, token, or transaction.

items.name: case transactionsAndChanges
items.desc: The persistent history transactions and changes since the requested date, token, or transaction.

items.name: case transactionsOnly
items.desc: The persistent history transactions since the requested date, token, or transaction.

items.name: case changesOnly
items.desc: The persistent history changes since the requested date, token, or transaction.
